pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ngs_tools![github version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-1.8.5-informational)[![pypi version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/ngs-tools)](https://pypi.org/project/ngs-tools/1.8.5/)![python versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/ngs-tools)![status](https://github.com/Lioscro/ngs-tools/workflows/CI/badge.svg)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/Lioscro/ngs-tools/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=CITIPF64QZ)](https://codecov.io/gh/Lioscro/ngs-tools)[![docs](https://readthedocs.org/projects/ngs-tools/badge/?version=latest)](https://ngs-tools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)[![license](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/ngs-tools)](LICENSE)Reusable tools for working with next-generation sequencing (NGS) dataDocumentation: https://ngs-tools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
